synopsis.text: The vibrant Kissuiso Inn is buzzling with activity once more, as Ohana finds herself immersed in the task of mentoring Wakura. During this time, Ohana stumbles upon old logbooks that hold undiscovered secrets about her mother's youth at the inn. As she delves deeper into her mother's past, she begins to draw parallels between their lives, causing her to reflect on their relationship. Amidst these personal revelations, a sudden power outage threatens to disrupt the upcoming influx of guests. This side story to the main series offers a glimpse into Ohana's journey of self-discovery and her newfound understanding of her mother.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
